original_title: ～社内で全裸は1人だけ～ インターン生の皆さん全裸でお仕事できますか？ SODで働く女子社員にはAV女優さんの気持ちを理解してもらうために羞恥研修を用意！ 入社前だけど身体を張って1日お仕事してもらいました♪ SOD女子社員
overview: [Training for unofficial candidates naked] This is Soft On Demand Co., Ltd. It is a company that survives thanks to an AV actress. In addition to having the prospective employee who joins the company as an intern this time understand the feelings of the actress firmly, she took off her suit to absorb the work contents in a pure state that exposed her body and mind. I'll have you work for a day.
title: What If You Were The Only One Naked At Work – Could You Still Do Your Job? We Find Out From The Interns At SOD – Our Female Employees Attempt The Ultimate Experience In Embarrassment! Try Working For One Day In The Nude, And You’re Hired!
